name: DZap
description: DZap: Unified Liquidity for DeFi, In One Click DZap empowers DeFi platforms, wallets, and protocols to unlock unified, cross-chain liquidity and intelligent execution, all through a single, seamless integration. Product Suite Zapping Infrastructure Access liquidity across 100+ chains and 100+ providers via DZap’s Meta Aggregator. Enable protocol-to-protocol flows, swaps, zaps, and through a single API — no need to manage routing, bridging, or slippage logic. AI Agent Toolkit Integrate intelligent agents that automate and optimize cross-chain transactions, execution strategies, and onchain decision-making, built for developers, deployed for users. 100+ Chains | 100+ Providers | $250M+ Volume Processed | Fully Audited Why Integrate DZap? - Boost TVL with One-Click Actions Drive user activity and liquidity growth by offering frictionless, AI-optimized DeFi experiences. - All DeFi Actions via One API Aggregate every major DeFi function — bridging, swapping, zapping, and routing — into a single programmable interface. - Access Unified Liquidity Instantly Plug into 100+ chains and 100+ liquidity providers without building individual integrations. - AI Infrastructure for Smart Execution Utilize DZap’s AI Agent Toolkit to build automated flows and dynamic user experiences. - Zero Dev & Maintenance Overhead We handle the backend logic, your team focuses on product, not infrastructure. - Go-Live in Hours, Not Weeks Developer-friendly SDKs, full documentation, and responsive support.
